articles.title: General Atlantic adds sustainable infrastructure strategy, as Actis joins platform to create a $96 billion AUM diversified global investor - Actis
articles.description: General Atlantic, a leading global growth investor, and Actis, a leading global investor in sustainable infrastructure, today announce
articles.content: Gabriel Caillaux, Co-President, Head of EMEA, and Head of Climate of General Atlantic, said: We have a shared commitment to deploying capital in sustainable infrastructure and the energy transition i… [+5893 chars]
